# Celestial Blood (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[Apostle of Peace (PrC)|Apostle of peace]] 6, [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[Pleasure (Domain)|Pleasure 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Nonevil creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 94

You channel holy power to grant the subject some of the protection enjoyed by celestial creatures. The subject gains resistance 10 to acid, cold, and electricity, a +4 bonus on saving throws against poison, and damage reduction 10/evil.

*Material Component:* A vial of holy water, with which you anoint the subjectâ€™s head.
